cosmos.question: I'm big and bright, I shine at night, but I'm not the Moon. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am very, very hot.
✨ I twinkle in the sky.
🌞 The Sun is one of me.

cosmos.question: I am a big ball of rock that goes around the Sun. I am your home. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I have lots of water.
🌱 I have trees and plants.
🧑‍🤝‍🧑 People live on me.

cosmos.question: I light up the night, but I have no light of my own. I reflect the Sun's light. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 Sometimes I am round.
🌑 Sometimes you cannot see me at all.
🐺 Werewolves like me.

cosmos.question: I am a hot, glowing ball of gas. Planets go around me. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I give us light and warmth during the day.
😎 You should wear sunglasses when you look at me.
🪴 Plants need me to grow.

cosmos.question: I am a planet. I am known for the beautiful rings around me. What am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are made of ice and rock.
🪐 I am a big, gassy planet.
🌑 I am not the planet closest to the sun.

cosmos.question: I am a planet that is red and dusty. People want to visit me one day. What am I?

hints.text: 🍫 My color reminds you of chocolate.
🚀 Some rovers are already driving on me!
👽 Some people think aliens might live here.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture in the sky. People used to use me to navigate. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 The Big Dipper is an example of me.
✨ You can see me best on a clear night.
🧭 Sailors used to use me to find their way.

cosmos.question: I am a large group of stars, dust, and gas held together by gravity. Our solar system is part of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 Mine looks milky.
💫 I am very, very big.
🌌 There are billions of me.

cosmos.question: I am a big, bright explosion of a star. After me, there might be a black hole! What am I?

hints.text: 💥 I am a powerful explosion.
🌟 I am the end of a star's life.
💫 I am much brighter than a normal star.

cosmos.question: I am a giant hole in space where gravity is so strong that nothing, not even light, can escape. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I am very, very dark.
🕳️ I suck everything in.
🌌 I am formed after a big star dies.

bug.question: I have six legs and love to march. I often carry food back to my home. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very small.
💪 I am known for being strong for my size.
🧺 I work with many others.

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar, then sleep in a cocoon, and wake up with beautiful wings. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I am known for my bright colors.
🦋 I love to fly around flowers.
🌱 I go through a big change in my life.

bug.question: I am a small, red bug with black spots. People say I bring good luck. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I am round and small.
⚫ I have dots on my back.
🍀 People think I'm lucky!

bug.question: I live in a hive and make honey. I have a stinger, so be careful! What am I?

hints.text: 🐝 I buzz around flowers.
🍯 I make something sweet.
⚠️ I can sting if I feel threatened.

bug.question: I jump very high and chirp loudly in the grass. I am usually green. What am I?

hints.text: 🦗 I have long legs.
🎶 I make a sound in the summer.
🌿 I blend in with the plants.

bug.question: I glow in the dark and fly around at night. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I light up.
🌙 I only come out when it's dark.
🔦 I'm not a lightbulb!

bug.question: I build a sticky web to catch my dinner. I have eight legs, not six. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ My home is made of silk.
🕷️ Some people are scared of me.
🍽️ I like to eat flies.

bug.question: I make a buzzing sound when I fly. I can be annoying in the summer. What am I?

hints.text: 🦟 I sometimes bite and leave a bump.
🔊 I make a high-pitched noise.
💧 I like to be near water.

bug.question: I eat wood and can damage houses. I live in colonies. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I like to eat trees and other wood things.
🏠 I can cause problems for buildings.
🏘️ I live with many of my kind.

bug.question: I have many legs and a long body. I crawl on the ground and sometimes curl up in a ball. What am I?

hints.text: 💯 I have many legs, but less than 1000!
🐛 I eat dead leaves and help the soil.
⚽ I can roll up into a ball if scared.
